com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit
Class Campaign

java.lang.Object
  com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.Campaign
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Campaign
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The Campaign class represents a single Campaign created within your Kit.

A Campaign is sent in the CampaignKitNotifier#didFindCampaign(Campaign) method whenever the Android device has become close enough a Place associated with that Campaign to trigger it.

See Also:
CampaignKitNotifier.didFindCampaign(Campaign), CampaignKitManager, Place, Serialized Form
